basics.name: Jatin Avinash Salve
basics.label: Computer Science Graduate Student & ML Engineer
basics.summary: Graduate student in Computer Science at University of Florida with expertise in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Multimodal AI. Published researcher with experience in healthcare AI applications and real-time systems development.

work.name: ICICI Bank
work.summary: Led migration to Adobe's personalization platform across multiple banking applications, impacting 10M+ customers. Built ML-driven recommendation engines and improved system efficiency by 7.5%.
highlights: Led migration to Adobe's personalization platform across RIB, CIB, NLI, and iMobile, impacting 10M+ customers
Improved efficiency by 7.5% and reduced rendering latency by 1s through optimized data processing pipelines
Built ML-driven recommendation engines with logistic regression & real-time event processing using Apache Kafka
Deployed scalable solutions in Unix/Linux environments with 99.9% uptime and automated CI/CD pipelines
Mentored junior developers and conducted technical knowledge sharing sessions

work.name: AI-ML-NLP Lab, IIT Patna
work.summary: Developed EDI-Summ, a multimodal summarization architecture for clinical documents, achieving state-of-the-art performance and publishing at ACL 2024.
highlights: Developed EDI-Summ, a multimodal summarization architecture with contextual + cross-attention
Achieved 0.81 factual recall and 3.51 clinical score, outperforming GPT-3.5 & GPT-4V
Enhanced BART pipelines with multimodal fusion for state-of-the-art healthcare summarization
Conducted experiments in Linux-based distributed research environments

work.name: Polytechnique de Montr√©al
work.summary: Built real-time decision support system for climate and water management, processing 20,000+ datasets across 30 cities and improving forecast accuracy by 25%.
highlights: Built real-time decision support system with React.js, Node.js, and ML models
Processed 20,000+ climate & water datasets across 30 cities
Improved forecast accuracy by 25% and planning efficiency by 30%
Deployed on Linux servers with scalable backend services

work.name: JoomlaCMS
work.summary: Developed customizable guided tour system with multi-language support, reducing onboarding drop-off by 20% and mentoring contributors in Google Summer of Code program.
highlights: Developed customizable guided tour system with multi-language support & progress tracking
Reduced onboarding drop-off by 20%
Mentored contributors in selective Google Summer of Code program (0.2% acceptance rate)
Collaborated with global teams via Git, Agile workflows, and CI/CD pipelines

volunteer.summary: Active contributor to open-source projects including JoomlaCMS, PyTorch, and various healthcare AI projects. Mentor students in ML/AI and software development.
highlights: Mentored 10+ junior developers and students in ML/AI and software development
Active contributor to JoomlaCMS, PyTorch, and various healthcare AI projects
Speaker at local tech meetups and AI/ML conferences
Teaching coding to underprivileged students

certificates.name: Google Cloud Professional Machine Learning Engineer

publications.name: From Sights to Insights: Towards Summarization of Multimodal Clinical Documents
publications.summary: Published at ACL 2024 - International Conference on Computational Linguistics. Developed state-of-the-art multimodal summarization architecture for clinical documents.

publications.name: EDI-Summ: Enhanced Multimodal Summarization for Healthcare Applications
publications.summary: Under review at EMNLP 2024 - Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing. Enhanced multimodal summarization system for healthcare applications.

projects.name: EDI-Summ: Multimodal Clinical Document Summarization
projects.summary: Developed state-of-the-art multimodal summarization architecture with contextual + cross-attention mechanisms, achieving 0.81 factual recall and 3.51 clinical score, outperforming GPT-3.5 & GPT-4V
highlights: Multimodal fusion architecture
Contextual and cross-attention mechanisms
Published at ACL 2024
Outperformed GPT-3.5 & GPT-4V

projects.name: Gestural AI ‚Äì Real-Time ASL Interpreter
projects.summary: Built real-time American Sign Language recognition system with 94% accuracy on 20,000+ videos & 166,000 images using Python, OpenCV, MediaPipe, and TensorFlow
highlights: 94% accuracy on 20,000+ videos
Real-time processing
Computer vision and gesture recognition
Deep learning implementation

projects.name: Climate Decision Support System
projects.summary: Designed real-time data analysis platform processing 20,000+ climate & water datasets across 30 cities, improving forecast accuracy by 25% using React.js, Node.js, and ML models
highlights: 20,000+ datasets processed
30 cities coverage
25% accuracy improvement
Real-time data analysis
